Wet Proofs
Blaise Larmee

These incredible wet proofs were included with early orders of The Spring Collection. Don't worry if you missed out — we have plenty more in store for you.

Wet proofs are pulled directly from offset lithographic plates for the artist's approval. For Blaise Larmee's forthcoming omnibus 3 Books they were necessary to ensure the proper appearance of black and gray inks across a wide spectrum of drawings, photographs, and paintings. There are 8 sets of prints in editions of 5. Each print is signed and numbered by the artist.
